class Solution {
    public int[] numsGame(int[] nums) {
        int[][] result = new int[2][3];
        result[0][1] = nums[0];
        result[1][1] = nums[0];
        result[0][2] = nums[0];
        result[1][2] = nums[0];
        int[] ans = new int[nums.length];
        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {
            int[][] temp = new int[2][3];
            temp[0][0] =  Math.min(result[0][0] + Math.abs(result[0][2] - (2 * nums[i] - 1 - i) * i / 2), result[1][0] + Math.abs(result[1][2] - (2 * nums[i] - 1 - i) * i / 2));
            temp[0][1] = nums[i];
            temp[0][2] = (2 * nums[i] - 1 - i) * i / 2 + nums[i];
            if (result[0][0] + Math.abs(nums[i] - (result[0][1])) > result[1][0] + Math.abs(nums[i] - (result[1][1]))) {
                temp[1][0] = result[1][0] + Math.abs(nums[i] - result[1][1] - 1);
                temp[1][1] = result[1][1] + 1;
                temp[1][2] = result[1][2] + result[1][1] + 1;
            } else {
                temp[1][0] = result[0][0] + Math.abs(nums[i] - result[0][1] - 1);
                temp[1][1] = result[0][1] + 1;
                temp[1][2] = result[0][2] + result[0][1] + 1;
            }
            result = temp;
            ans[i] = Math.min(result[0][0], result[1][0]);
        }
        return ans;
    }
}
